main_definition: A quarter refers to one-fourth of a whole, 25 percent, or a division of time equaling 15 minutes.

meanings_and_examples.example: I cut the cake into quarters to share with my friends.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A monetary unit equal to 25 cents or one-fourth of a dollar in some currencies, such as the USD and JPY
meanings_and_examples.example: He paid $0.25 for a pack of gum with quarters.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A period of 15 minutes or one-fourth of an hour
meanings_and_examples.example: The meeting was scheduled to start at the quarter past noon, meaning it would begin at 12:15 PM.
